channel.title: forecasts on Boris Blagov
channel.description: Recent content in forecasts on Boris Blagov

item.title: Latest international and German RWI forecasts: September 2019
item.description: The latest RWI – Leibniz Institute for Economic Research forecasts for the international economy and Germany is from September 2019. See the publication here or have a look at the full [document] in German(http://www.rwi-essen.de/media/content/pages/publikationen/rwi-konjunkturberichte/rwi-kb_3-2019.pdf).

item.title: Summer 2019: RWI economic forecast
item.description: The June 2019 RWI – Leibniz Institute for Economic Research forecasts update for Germany has been published. We have revised our forecast downward slightly and now expect output growth for Germany of 0.8% (down from 0.9%) for 2019 and 1.4% GDP growth for 2020 (down from 1.5%). See the publication here or have a look directly at the document.

item.title: Spring Joint Economic Forecast 2019
item.description: The Spring Joint Economic Forecast has been published! See the publication here.

item.title: New RWI economic forecasts
item.description: The March 2019 RWI – Leibniz institute for economic research forecasts for the international and the German economies have been published. See the publication here..
